document_data.name: Elryn
document_data.mainbody: Dread Brother '''Elryn''' was a [[Sharran]] priest during the midâ€“8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Elryn starkly regretted his lack of familiarity with the arcane, for one, and for another, he was quite dissatisfied by his underlings' carelessness.
document_data.Description: He was a bald man who wore purple and black robes.
document_data.Possessions: He looted a plethora of magic from [[Karsus' Keep]].{{cite book/Elminster Ascending/The Temptation of Elminster|707-713|18}}
document_data.Relationships: He led five Dreadspells in his last mission: [[Hrelgrath]], [[Vaelam]], [[Daluth]], [[Iyrindyl]], and [[Femter Deldrannus]]. Throughout the task, he was ever-aware of [[Avroana]]'s possible scrying.
document_data.Abilities: As a Dreadspell, he wielded borrowed arcane power.
